title: Help!!!!! please T_T
body: everytime I open league and find a game everything would run smoothly til my character icon before the start of the actual game would reach 100 percent, It would not proceed into the actual game T_T please I really want to play this game

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having an unstable connection problem that's getting hiccups and failing to fully reach the game server.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities with your network.  Test it out in a custom game and let me know how it goes.
It's really important to go through each step in that guide.  This will help rule out possibilities as well as strengthen your connection to our game servers.  Let me know if you have any questions!

mr porocles my league cant run perfectly as an administrator, I downloaded the hextech repair tool and its is stated that it cant run as an administrator even though its is already ran as an administrator

\

There may be a setting within your PC or even anti-virus that's blocking it from launching.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings to allow both the HRT and the patcher to scan game files.  Hope it helps!
